content.raw:
Unfortunately, I updated (gazebo and drcsim) and I am executing "gzlog stop".
It doesn't help.
The closing tag </gazebo_log> is still missing and I have to add it manually:
"echo \</gazebo_log\> >> /tmp/qual_task_1/state.log"
I tried several times without success.
Can I upload qualification log files after echoing </gazebo_log> to the end of the file?
